oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb al-Uns wa-al-īnās fī futūḥ Ifrīqīyah ilá madīnat Fās : manuscript, 1795
Uns wa-al-īnās fī futūḥ Ifrīqīyah ilá madīnat Fās
Futūḥ Ifrīqīyah
Livre de l'amitié et de la familiarité au sujet des conquêtes des villes jusqu'à Fès
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Jazāʼirī, Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: الحمد لله مانح النعم فضلا من عنده المحسن بما يقوم به احدا بحقه وان بالغ غاية جهده... :Incipit
Written in one column, 21 lines per page, in black and red, framed within double red lines.
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 24.8 x 18.4 cm. (18.5 x 11.2 cm.).
Bound in original blind stamped red leather, with flap.
According to the colophon (f. 185v), copy completed in Shaʻbān 1209 AH [March 1795 AD] in the hand of Muḥammad ibn ʻUmar ibn Ibrāhīm al-Jazāʼirī.
MS Arab SM186. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Africa, North--History
